item.title: INDIE Live Expo: November 29, 2025 to feature over 100 titles
item.content:encoded:
Core Keeper, SacriFire, Magical Princess, and more.

The November 29, 2025 edition of INDIE Live Expo will feature updates and announcements on over 100 independent titles, organizer Ryu’s office announced.

Some of the games set to appear include:

  • Core Keeper, the survival crafting sandbox adventure with over three million copies sold worldwide developed by Pugstorm and published by both Fireshine Games and bilibili.
  • SacriFire, the supernatural pixel art JRPG developed by Pixelated Milk.
  • A brand-new project from room6, the publisher behind Unreal Life and ghostpia Season One.
  • Yunyun Syndrome!? Rhythm Psychosis, the psychological rhythm adventure co-developed by both Alliance Arts and WHO YOU.
  • Magical Princess, the child-rearing simulator based on the beloved Magical board game series created by MAGI Inc., and developed by Neotro.

The broadcast will feature INDIE Live Expo-signature segments, starting with dozens of rapid-fire updates during “INDIE Waves,” an extended look at hand-selected titles during “INDIE Spotlight,” and an honoring of 2025’s standout independent titles during “INDIE Live Expo Awards.”

The panel of judges for this year’s awards segment feature eight industry veterans from four countries, including Shuhei Yoshida (former head of Sony Interactive Entertainment’s indie initiative) and Keiichiro Toyama, (creator of Silent Hill and SIREN, and CEO of Slitterhead developer Bokeh Game Studio).

INDIE Live Expo will air on November 29 at 1:00 a.m. PT / 4:00 a.m. ET / 18:00 JST. You will be able to watch it on YouTube (English, Japanese, Korean), Twitter (English, Japanese, Korean), Twitch (English, Japanese), Niconico, Bilibili, and Steam.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/indie-live-expo-november-29-2025-to-feature-over-100-titles

item.title: Carmageddon: Rogue Shift announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Full reveal set for December 4.

34BigThings has announced roguelite racing action game Carmageddon: Rogue Shift for PC (Steam). A full reveal is planned for December 4 at 4:00 a.m. PT / 7:00 a.m. ET.

While the game’s name appears as the blacked-out “███████████: Rogue Shift” on Steam, the SteamDB application history shows it was renamed from Carmageddon: Rogue Shift.

Here is the description of the game on its Steam page:

Carmageddon: Rogue Shift ██ █ ████-███████████ combat-racing roguelite ██ ███ ████ ████ ███████ ███ ██████ ███ ██████ II – 34BigThings.

██ day ███ skyline ████████; ██ night zombie ██████ – ███ ██████ – █████ █████ avenue. ████ ████ way out ██ ██ win ███ ███████████. █ chain ██ lethal ███████████ races █████ ████████ █████ █ ████ ██ ███ ████ █████████ beyond the mountains.

Watch the teaser trailer below.

Teaser Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/carmageddon-rogue-shift-announced-for-pc
